title: Can I cash in to GCash with coins?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you want to add money to your GCash wallet using coins, you can do so at the Coin Deposit Machines provided by the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP). These machines accept all coins issued by the BSP,  including centavos.

To find out where these machines are located, visit the [official website of the BSP](https://www.bsp.gov.ph/Pages/CoinsAndNotes/CDM.aspx).
